What we do?

Trufla helps you build faster with templates and workflows for insurance, claims, and payments â€” ready for your team from day one.

Whether you're handling claims, payments, or compliance, our templates and workflows are crafted to save time, reduce errors, and keep your documents consistent.

From claim forms to payment workflows, Trufla empowers insurance teams to work with confidence and scale without the overhead.

Our Team

Meet the people behind Trufla. We focus on clear processes, fast support, and templates that help you handle payments and claims with confidence.
